meta.title: Ahmet FATIHOGLU - Senior Software Developer
meta.description: Ahmet FATIHOGLU - Senior Software Developer Portfolio. Showcasing full-stack web, desktop, and mobile development projects with expertise in C# .NET, React, and cloud technologies.
meta.author: Ahmet FATIHOGLU
meta.keywords: Ahmet FATIHOGLU, Senior Software Developer, C#, VB.NET, PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript, Kotlin, Java, C, C++, Laravel, React, Vue, Angular, ASP.NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, .NET Framework, .NET Core, Web API, REST API, WCF, gRPC, Microservices, n-Tier Architecture, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Cassandra, Redis, Microsoft Azure, Azure Virtual Machines, Azure Storage, Azure Functions, Azure Blobs, Azure File Share, Azure Tables, Heroku, Docker, VirtualBox

summary.main: Senior Software Developer with 9+ years of experience in full-stack web, desktop, and mobile development.
highlights: Specializes in C# .NET ecosystem, building scalable ERP architectures and microservices.
Proficient in TypeScript, React.js, Vue.js, and cross-platform mobile development with Dart/Flutter.
Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate - 2023.
Proven track record of delivering clean, maintainable software solutions, resolving complex technical issues, and implementing effective, scalable systems.

tasks: Contributed to the development and maintenance of the company's core ERP application and other internal systems as part of a collaborative software development team.
Developed using ASP.NET MVC, Web Services (WCF), ASP.NET Core, RESTful API, WinForms, DevExpress, MS SQL Server, React.js and Flutter.
Developed C# .NET applications using WPF, and Console platforms, following the best practices.
Built RESTful services and web applications with PHP Laravel and Lumen frameworks using MVC pattern.
Designed and managed database solutions with MySQL.
Developed C# .NET applications using .NET Core and .NET Framework, including Windows Services, WPF, Console apps, and n-Tier architecture projects.
Built ASP.NET MVC web applications following n-Tier architecture.
Implemented Azure services such as Blobs, File Share, Tables, and MS SQL for cloud-based solutions.
Developed C# .NET applications using ASP.NET Core, MVC, WinForms, WPF, and Console platforms, following n-Tier and Microservices architectures.
Built RESTful services and web applications with PHP Laravel and Lumen frameworks using MVC pattern.
Designed and managed database solutions with MS SQL and MySQL.
Contributed to the development and maintenance of the company's core ERP web application and other internal systems as part of a collaborative software development team.
Developed using ASP.NET WebForms, DevExpress and MS SQL Server (Stored Procedure).
Built and maintained full-stack applications through all stages of the development lifecycle.
Built responsive, cross-browser compatible web interfaces.
Utilized CI tools such as Heroku and Azure for automated deployment.
Provided IT support and software development consulting services.
Designed, analyzed, developed, tested, debugged and maintained full-stack applications.
Wrote code that meets standards and provides desired functionality using project-specific technologies.
Built responsive, cross-browser compatible web interfaces.
Collaborated with team members using Git, Slack, Asana, and Jira.
Worked with system engineers, developers, project managers, and analysts to deliver integrated, scalable solutions.
Prepared the necessary documentation in line with the project requirements.
Troubleshooted and configured web servers and extended them with necessary modules and plugins.
Designed, modeled, developed, managed, backed up and deployed application databases.
Implemented backup and recovery strategies.
Installed, configured and managed virtual machines.
Installed, configured and updated operating systems and necessary software.
Converted Photoshop and illustrator images into HTML5 applications.
Provided customer support by answering questions and resolving technical issues.
Contributed innovative ideas to enhance application functionality and optimize user experience.

projects.name: RepoAIfy
description: Architected and developed a dual-interface .NET 9 solution (WPF & CLI) to analyze and document large codebases, using the MVVM pattern to ensure a clean separation of concerns.
Implemented a dynamic, real-time file filtering system with an interactive tree view and cancellable tasks for a responsive and seamless user experience.
Engineered an automated output chunking feature to split large code analyses into manageable Markdown files, optimizing them for AI model consumption and review.

projects.name: AI Utils Extension
description: Developed a Chrome extension featuring a multi-step AI pipeline using Google's Gemini AI to perform complex operations on browser tabs, including summarization, translation, and custom data extraction.
Engineered a modern, responsive user interface with React 19 and Tailwind CSS, featuring real-time task status updates and the ability to synthesize data from multiple tabs into a single output.

Established a professional, scalable development environment with a strict testing framework (Vitest, React Testing Library) and automated code quality checks using ESLint, Prettier, and Husky git hooks.

projects.name: E-Store
description: Architected a full-stack e-commerce application on .NET 6, implementing a scalable N-Tier design to cleanly separate the Data Access (DAL), Business Logic (BLL), and API layers.
Implemented a secure RESTful backend API featuring JWT-based authentication to protect user data and manage application access, fully documented with Swagger.
Developed a complete user-facing application using ASP.NET Core MVC and Razor Views, integrating core e-commerce features like a product catalog, shopping cart, and order processing.

projects.name: Notification System
description: Designed and implemented a distributed system using a microservices architecture, separating user and notification functionalities into independent, scalable services.
Configured an API Gateway using Ocelot to provide a single, unified entry point, centralizing request routing and simplifying service discovery for the frontend.
Built a high-performance data access layer using the Dapper ORM for direct SQL query execution, ensuring efficient communication between services and the database.

projects.name: Sinav Oluşturma (Exam Management System)
description: Developed a full-stack exam management system using a clean N-Tier architecture to logically separate the API backend, business logic, and data access layers.
Implemented a secure, role-based authentication system with JWT to provide distinct permissions and application views for Admin and standard User roles.
Integrated a web scraping module using HtmlAgilityPack to dynamically extract and import content for exam creation, demonstrating practical data extraction skills.

projects.name: Exchange (Real-time Exchange Rate Tracker)
description: Engineered a real-time data pipeline using WebSockets to stream live currency updates from a .NET Core backend to a responsive Vue.js client.
Implemented Redis for high-performance in-memory caching, dramatically reducing database load and enabling high-frequency, low-latency data updates.
Developed a multi-component system including a secure RESTful API with JWT authentication and a separate background service to simulate market data fluctuations.

projects.name: Market (Customer Management System)
description: Developed a full-stack customer management application using a clean N-Tier architecture, leveraging the NHibernate ORM for robust, object-oriented data access.
Built a feature-rich and responsive single-page application (SPA) with Angular 11 for comprehensive data management, including interactive data grids with ag-Grid.
Designed and implemented a clean RESTful API to serve as the communication layer between the Angular frontend and the .NET backend, ensuring seamless CRUD operations.

education.degree: B.Sc. Electrical & Electronics Engineering - Computer Engineering
education.institution: University of Aleppo, Faculty of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Aleppo, Syria.

sections.title: 1. Who We Are
sections.content:
This website (“we”, “our”, “us”) is operated by [Your Name / Company Name], based in [Your Country].  
For Turkey, we are the **Data Controller** under Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data (KVKK).  
For the EU/EEA, we are the **Data Controller** under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

sections.title: 2. What Data We Collect
sections.content:
When you submit a form on our website, we collect the information you provide, which may include:

- Name
- Email address
- Any other details you choose to share in the message field

We do **not** use cookies or tracking technologies on this website.

sections.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
sections.content:
We use your submitted information solely to:

- Respond to your inquiries
- Provide the services or information you requested
- Maintain records of our communications

sections.title: 4. How Your Data is Processed
sections.content:
Form submissions are securely transmitted to and processed by **Getform**, a third-party form backend service.  
Getform stores your submission data on its servers and may process it in accordance with its own [Privacy Policy](https://getform.io/legal/privacy-policy).  
We have chosen Getform because it complies with industry-standard security practices.

sections.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
sections.content:
- **GDPR (EU/EEA)**: Processing is based on your consent (Article 6(1)(a)) and/or our legitimate interest in responding to your request (Article 6(1)(f)).
- **KVKK (Turkey)**: Processing is based on your explicit consent and/or the necessity to fulfill your request under Article 5(2).

sections.title: 6. Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined above, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

sections.title: 7. Your Rights
sections.content:
Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

- Access the personal data we hold about you
- Request correction or deletion of your data
- Withdraw your consent at any time
- Object to processing or request restriction of processing
- File a complaint with the relevant data protection authority

For Turkey, you may exercise your rights under **KVKK Article 11** by contacting us at [Your Contact Email].

sections.title: 8. International Data Transfers
sections.content:
Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your own, including the United States, where Getform’s servers may be located.  
We ensure such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws.

sections.title: 9. Contact Us
sections.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Notice or how we handle your data, please contact:  
[Your Name / Company Name]  
Email: [Your Contact Email]  
Address: [Your Address]
